article.name: Ice Crystal
article.description:
Originally a development piece to draw automated label lines, this project soon became an icy project creating transparent crystals.
All done through actionscript, no symbols, no drawings, just a blank stage. 3 frames, 4 functions, a splodge of Maths.
If you leave it, it\'ll slowly grow. However, to accellerate lightly move your mouse over the image.
